improved_creatives.new_creative_message: Finally, panties that feel like a dream! Our Cotton Classic Panties offer cloud-like softness & a perfect fit, so comfy you'll forget you're wearing them. Experience true all-day comfort – Shop now!
improved_creatives.improvement_description: More benefit-focused (dream-like feel, forget you're wearing them), added stronger CTA, and engaging language. Stressed ultimate comfort/freedom.
